sentences: The EU noted that Article 2.3 (adverse effects of policies and measures) was addressed under other agenda items.
JAPAN proposed integrating the item with discussions on Protocol Article 3.14 (adverse effects).
Saudi Arabia, for the G-77/CHINA, said they are separate issues.
GHANA said the issue is not just an OPEC issue and should be considered broadly, including how policies and measures in developed countries will affect trade.
